title: Angel Number 99: What It Means & What to Do When You See It

steps.title: Angel number 99 indicates the end of one phase and the start of another.
steps.content: Angel number 99 indicates the end of one phase and the start of another. Many times, this means that one aspect of your life—a relationship, a job, a spiritual or mental state of mind—is coming to a close to make room for something deeper or more meaningful in your future. Whatever the reason, rest assured that your guardian angels (or God, or the universe, or the higher power you believe in) have your back during this transitional time. [1] X Research source These changes aren’t always easy and may seem intimidating or sad. Remember that the universe’s plans for you always seek to help you find your true, higher calling. Think of the end of a phase like the pruning of a plant. You’re clearing away old beliefs or baggage to make room for new, healthy growth.

steps.title: Noticing angel number 99 is a sign to pay attention to your intuition.
steps.content: Noticing angel number 99 is a sign to pay attention to your intuition . Your inner voice, thoughts, and ideas are essential to who you are and serve to guide you toward your higher purpose in life. The angels may send you 99 as a reminder to get reacquainted with your inner self if you’ve lost touch with your intuition or feel unsure of yourself. [2] X Research source Make regular time to clear your mind and listen to your true thoughts, wants, and desires. Try meditating , journaling, or blocking off some undistracted “me time” to center yourself. Some believe your intuition is your direct connection to the energy of the universe. By following it, you’re guided to a higher spiritual level of being.

steps.title: Number 99 has double the vibrational energy of the number 9.
steps.content: Number 99 has double the vibrational energy of the number 9. Number 9 is the final single-digit number and represents the end of an era or cycle in numerology. It’s also associated with your inner wisdom and strength, humanitarian work, and a healthy spiritual life. By doubling this energy, 99 assures you that, even though one aspect of your life is coming to a close, something new and rewarding will begin immediately after. [3] X Research source Just like the number 10 represents larger and more complex numbers after the number 9, the new phase of your life will feel more meaningful and rich because your closer to your true calling.

steps.title: Number 99 is a reminder there’s room for growth in every relationship.
steps.content: Number 99 is a reminder there’s room for growth in every relationship. Seeing 99 when you’re in a relationship is a wonderful thing—it confirms that your bond is based on mutual respect, understanding, and love. But, there’s always an opportunity to enter a new phase of even deeper connection. Communicate your true needs and wants to your partner regularly, and don’t be afraid to try new things together. [4] X Research source Look for opportunities to learn and grow together. This could be something small and fun, like taking a couples cooking class, or something more impactful, like finally opening the family-run business of your dreams. The new phase you enter as a couple could be an emotional one, or there may be noticeable changes like moving in together, starting a family, or getting engaged or married.

steps.title: If you’re single, 99 is a sign you might enter a new relationship soon.
steps.content: If you’re single, 99 is a sign you might enter a new relationship soon. Listen to your intuition when it tells you to get out of your comfort zone . Go new places, meet new people, and try new things to increase your opportunities to connect with someone special. Try not to have rigid expectations—whether you have a short fling or a long-lasting relationship, the universe is guiding you to people who will help you grow. Keep an open mind when it comes to finding a lover. It’s possible you’ve already met your future partner, but just haven’t looked at them in a romantic light yet. Don’t stress about the timing or feel down if you’ve been “single forever.” The angels will bring your significant other to you at the moment that’s most beneficial for your personal growth.

steps.title: Seeing 99 means you’ll meet or reunite with your twin flame soon.
steps.content: Seeing 99 means you’ll meet or reunite with your twin flame soon. A twin flame is your “mirror soul”—someone you’re so connected to that they feel like your other half. Whether you’ve never met your twin flame before or you’re experiencing a separation, a new and exciting phase of your relationship will soon begin. To help things along, do your best to remain humble . Twin flames help each other grow, and too much individual pride may cause friction between you. [5] X Research source Signs your twin flame is drawing near include: A calming presence that makes you feel like you’re not alone A sudden need to explore your past passions Attraction to new places Immense excitement or a feeling of completeness A sudden need to improve yourself

steps.title: 99 could mean you’re working in your calling (or you’re close to finding it).
steps.content: 99 could mean you’re working in your calling (or you’re close to finding it). Number 99 is very lucky for your career and finances. Since it’s all about new beginnings, you might be on the verge of a raise or promotion, finding a new or more satisfying job, or being able to support yourself on your passion projects. Keep your eyes peeled for opportunities that could propel you forward. For example, say you always pass a billboard with 99 on it on your way to an unfulfilling day job. This might be a sign it’s time to move on to a job that feels more meaningful to you. Surround yourself with positive, motivating people to help you on your way. This could mean networking with successful colleagues in your industry, or building a social support system outside of work that encourages you to chase your dreams.

steps.title: If you’re manifesting a goal, 99 could mean you’re close to achieving it.
steps.content: If you’re manifesting a goal , 99 could mean you’re close to achieving it. Manifesting takes patience, effort, and a belief that you’re capable of making your dreams come true—all things that your guardian angels reward! If you spot angel number 99, it’s a sign that your dedication is paying off. Keep working toward your goal with the confidence that you’ll succeed. To aid your manifestation, try meditating or working with crystals to visualize your goals more clearly. Crystals that complement the vibrational energy of 99 include clear quartz , rose quartz, citrine , amethyst, Tiger’s Eye , and black tourmaline.

steps.title: Write down what you were doing when you first noticed number 99.
steps.content: Write down what you were doing when you first noticed number 99. The angels usually send numbers and symbols when you’re doing something related to their message for you. Each time you spot 99, jot down every detail you can recall about the experience—where you saw it, who you were with, what emotions you were feeling right before, and more. No detail is too insignificant! For example, say you exchange phone numbers with an intriguing stranger at a bar and notice their number ends with 99. This could be a sign they’re your twin flame or a potential partner. Or, imagine you’re lamenting your low-paying job while sifting through your coin jar and you count exactly 99 cents. This might be a sign that it’s time to request a promotion or move on to greener pastures.

steps.title: Trust your intuition and stay open to new opportunities.
steps.content: Trust your intuition and stay open to new opportunities. Angel number 99 is a symbol of new beginnings, but you’re unlikely to find one if you're stuck in the same old daily routine. Make an effort to try new things , like exploring a sport or hobby you’ve been curious about or signing up for a class to develop a new skill, like pottery or flute lessons. If you get a “gut feeling” that this new activity is for you, stick with it! For example, if you notice you feel more confident after taking up rock climbing, then something about that activity (the mental focus, the physical challenge, the people you’ve met) could be important to your overall personal growth.

steps.title: Help other people, especially those in your community.
steps.content: Help other people, especially those in your community. You’ve most likely received help, support, or encouragement at some point in your life. Now that you’re approaching a new, more enlightened beginning, pay that energy forward. Volunteer at a local community center or organization you’re passionate about, reach out to your loved ones who may need support, or donate clothes, old items, or money to good causes. [6] X Research source Many people think of large national or international organizations when they’re feeling altruistic. These organizations do meaningful work, but there are also opportunities for you to make a big impact locally as well. Helping others will also boost your own mental and emotional well-being and can help reduce feelings of depression or anxiety, too.

steps.title: Let go of past hurts that are holding you back.
steps.content: Let go of past hurts that are holding you back. A new beginning is a time to drop negative beliefs or work through past problems that make you feel insecure, powerless, or less than. Try using positive affirmations to counter negative self-talk, or clearing the air with people that may have wronged you in the past. You don’t have to forgive them exactly, but gaining closure can free you to explore your higher self. [7] X Research source Forgive yourself for any wrongdoings or mistakes you’re holding on to as well. Remember that no one is perfect and it’s OK to fumble while you find your path in life.
